title: [RESOLVED] Clubs outage - Oct 2016

embed.description: Hey all - Riot martlet here from the Clubs team - let’s talk about the recent (and ongoing) clubs outage. First things first: we’re aiming to be up and running by Monday.

body:
Hi all,

Riot martlet, from the clubs team has put up a great post on the NA boards explaining what is going on with Clubs at the moment.

If you are interested to find out more about what is going on, and when it will be coming back, it is worth checking out.

-Mindstar

replies.body: Club tags not showing in game?

So hopefully tomorrow, and it will be all good.
Unless they meant next week.
hello does someone knows how i could get the new patch with the assassin rework i am really lost... ?
Thats done in next season not this one.

ok thx 
do you know how I can play on the test server? PLZ

You mean the PBE?
You'll have to sign up for it, but even than its only a temp account.
And you might not get in.

Sign up here: (I think)
https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe

oh thx
do u know how i could play on the test server?
yes plz fix i want my club back{{item:3073}}
